person_say: I’ve been lacking motivation to study lately, and I have no interest in it. Are there any ways to boost my study drive?
animal_say: There’s a busy little bee named Bizy who is a pro at tackling procrastination and boosting motivation! Would you like to meet her?

person_say: No, I don’t think meeting Bizy sounds interesting. I need something that actually works for me.
animal_say: Sometimes, mixing up your study routine can really help! Try setting small goals and rewarding yourself after achieving them—just like a forest critter finding a tasty snack!
